name: Vivek Pal
bio: Full Stack Deveoper. Learning Web3. Open Source Enthusiast! Founder and Developer Shastra OS

milestones.title: Published first book.
milestones.description: Edited and published first book with Mukul Pal on Amazon.

milestones.title: Completed CS50 2021
milestones.description: Introduction to the intellectual enterprises of computer science and the art of programming by Harvard University.

milestones.title: Completed Full Stack open 2021
milestones.description: University of Helsinki's Full Stack open 2021, The course introduces modern web application development with JavaScript. The main focus is on single-page applications implemented with the React library, and REST interfaces implemented with Node.js that support them.

milestones.title: Started working on ShastraOS
milestones.description: Started building ShastraOS as Founder and Developer. It is a decentralized OS based on Arch.
